summary: If you have an individual retirement account (IRA), you know its tax breaks can make it easier to save for retirement. Most IRAs hold investments in traditional assets like stocks and mutual funds. But if you want to invest in non-traditional assets like real estate or virtual currency, your IRA might run afoul of tax laws. You can, however, apply for an exemption from the...
title: Individual Retirement Accounts: Formalizing Labor's and IRS's Collaborative Efforts Could Strengthen Oversight of Prohibited Transactions
